function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers underestimating the risk of contagion due to strong brand loyalty and trust","Impact":"Increased potential for contagion spread as consumers remain loyal to brands and maintain trust in them despite health risks","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns on contagion risk and safety measures","Technologies":"Digital advertising and social media platforms for widespread messaging","People":"Consumers, general public","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate risk assessment and management of contagion in brand experience environments","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagion in retail, service, and brand experience environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict contagion control measures, regular sanitization, and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Contactless technology, air filtration systems, UV disinfection","People":"Retailers, service providers, brand managers","Owner":"Business owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Overemphasis on customer experience and brand image leading to negligence of contagion risk","Impact":"Neglect of contagion risk in pursuit of optimizing customer experience and brand image","Mitigation":"Incorporating contagion risk assessment and management into customer experience strategies","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring air quality, crowd density, and social distancing compliance","People":"Brand managers, customer experience professionals","Owner":"Business owners, public health authorities"}]}
